content: --अर्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} having another aim or meaning. {2} intended or designed for another, done for another. (--र्थः {1} the highest interest or advantage. {2} the interest of another (<ab>opp.</ab> स्वार्थ); स्वार्थो यस्य परार्थ एव स पुमानेकः सतामग्रणीः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 29.</ls> {3} the chief or highest meaning. {4} the highest object ({%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} sexual intercourse). (--र्थं --र्थे {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} for the sake of another.
